participant_1.background:
I want to learn how to knit sweaters to keep me warm in the winter.
My family works to support my dreams.
I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal.
i m the youngest of five.
I had to sell my motorcycle to pay for my car.

participant_2.background:
My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I'd brag about how I'm able to balance my business and my love of crafts.
i enjoy sleeping in on my days off.
i am well built and tall.
I loved listening to music with my dad.

content.text: Good morning, how are you doing today?
So far so good, I'm learning how to knit sweaters, and I'm really enjoying it. What kind of hobbies do you like?
I love to cook, sleep in, and listen to music. My dad is a chef and my sister is a server, so my favorite food is always on the table.
I love that! I'm a bit of a foodie myself, and I love to cook as well.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love to make soups and stews. They're so easy to make and they're always so delicious.
That sounds amazing! I love a good soup or stew on a cold day.
Me too! I have a really good recipe for chicken noodle soup that I love to make.
I would love to try that! I'll have to come over for dinner sometime.
You're welcome to anytime! I'm always happy to cook for people.
